title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Advanced Tourism Industry Data Analysis: AI-Based Predictive Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis, experience with data visualization tools, and understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can preprocess and normalize tourism industry data to convert it into an analyzable format.
Learners can explain the principles and application methods of federated learning-based tourism demand forecasting models.
Homomorphic encryption techniques can be applied to analyze sensitive tourism data while maintaining security
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
